text: (Napiye! Itarku munnar nam tutarkal palarai anuppiya) ivvare um'maiyum nam (nam tutaraka) oru kuttattaritam anuppivaittom. Ivarkalukku munnarum (ivarkalil) pala vakuppinar cenrirukkinranar. (Ninta kalamaka avarkalitam oru tutarum varavillai.) Akave, nam umakku vahyi mulam arivippavarrai ivarkalukku nir otik kanpittu varuviraka. Eninum, ivarkalo (unkalai nirakarippatu mattumalla; tankal mitu pala arulkal purintirukkum alavarra arulalanakiya) rahmanaiyume nirakarikkinranar. (Napiye!
